title: RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED. This error may appear if you passed in a non-contiguous input.
body_html:
pytorch 0.4 cuda8 cudnn6
code is:

        #stn net
        self.GridNet1 = nn.Sequential(nn.Conv2d(2048, 256, 1, bias=False))
         self.stn_loc = nn.Sequential(nn.Conv2d(256,6,1,bias=False))

         .....
         xs = self.GridNet1(x)
        theta = self.stn_loc(xs)
        theta = theta.view(-1, 2, 3)

        grid = F.affine_grid(theta, x.size())
        x = F.grid_sample(x, grid)

the error is:
loss.backward()
RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED. This error may appear if you passed in a non-contiguous input.

I try add "torch.backends.cudnn.enabled=False"
but the error:
RuntimeError: AffineGridGenerator needs CuDNN for processing CUDA inputs, but CuDNN is not enabled

if run the code in cpu mode is ok.
